pr_title: DBZ-1782 Allowing any JSR 223 implementation for filtering SMT

timeline.message: DBZ-1782 Allowing any JSR 223 implementation for filtering SMT
DBZ-1782 Inverting filtering logic, so to be consistent with Stream#filter() and other similar APIs
DBZ-1782 Inverting filtering logic, so to be consistent with Stream#filter() and other similar APIs

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                 * Evaluates whether the record should be filtered out or not by executing the expression.
          
          
            
                 * Evaluates whether the record matches the predicate expression.
timeline.author: Naros
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -26,7 +26,7 @@
      * Evaluates whether the record should be filtered out or not by executing the expression.

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                 * @return true to keep the record, false to remove it
          
          
            
                 * @return true if the input argument matches the predicate expression, otherwise false
timeline.author: Naros
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -26,7 +26,7 @@

      *
      * @param record to be evaluated
-     * @return true to remove the record, false to keep it
+     * @return true to keep the record, false to remove it
